Package crops

Class Crop

java.lang.Object
crops.Crop
Direct Known Subclasses:
CropCabbage, CropCauliflower, CropCorn, CropPotato, CropTomato, CropWheat
public class Crop
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a crop on the player's farm.

  • Constructor Details

    • Crop

      public Crop​(java.lang.String kind, double buying, double selling, int time)
      Constructor using parameters.
      Parameters:
      kind - The type of crop.
      buying - The purchase price.
      selling - The selling price.
      time - The harvest time in days.

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public java.lang.String getType()
      Gets the type of crop.
      Returns:
      type

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice()
      Gets the purchasing price of the crop.
      Returns:
      purchasePrice

    • getSalePrice

      public double getSalePrice()
      Gets the selling price of the crop.
      Returns:
      salePrice

    • getHarvestTime

      public int getHarvestTime()
      Gets the current time until the crop can be harvested.
      Returns:
      daysUntilHarvest

    • getGrowingTime

      public int getGrowingTime()
      Gets the total time the crop has been growing for. Does not count days taken away by using an item on the crop.
      Returns:
      growingTime

    • changeHarvestTime

      public void changeHarvestTime​(int change)
      Changes the current harvest time of the crop. Sets the harvest time to 0 if the harvest time will go below 0.
      Parameters:
      change - The desired change in harvest time.

    • increaseGrowTime

      public void increaseGrowTime()
      Increases the growing time of the crop by one. Is not called when an item is used on the crop.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
